column4: reservation_create_txt_0,"Client reservation"
reservation_create_txt_1,"A new reservation has been created"
reservation_create_txt_2,"To review this reservation online follow these simple steps"
reservation_create_txt_3,"Login as administrator"
reservation_create_txt_4,"Open Reservation section, then click on this reservation id"
reservation_create_txt_5,"Thats it! you can now cancel it or ask questions about this reservation"

reservation_cancel_txt_3,"Login as administrator"
reservation_cancel_txt_4,"Open Reservation section, then click on this reservation id"

column3: signup_txt_0,"Welcome to Marina del Sol Condominiums!"
signup_txt_2,"Your account has been sent and will be processed as soon as possible."
signup_txt_3,"We will contact you by email/phone to define some details about your registration request."
signup_txt_4,"And please remmember, that our primary objetive is to make you feel really comfortable."
signup_txt_5,"To change this data, you have to login to User Panel, then open section Your Account."
signup_txt_6,"Note: Please remmember that your login id, is your email."
pwd_forgotten_3,"If you are reading this message, is because you or someone is trying to restore your password to gain access to your account."
pwd_forgotten_4,"Please, click on the link below to change your password."
pwd_forgotten_5,"Note: This link will work for 4 hours only"
pwd_forgotten_delete,"Note: We recomend you to delete this message to prevent unwanted users gain access to your account at our site."
